## 公钥密码

> Author: acdxvfsvd

### BabyRSA

#### 题目代码

```python
from Crypto.Util.number import *

flag = bytes_to_long("n1book{*********}")

p = getPrime(128)
q = getPrime(128)
n = p * q
e = 65537

cipher = pow(flag, e, n)
print n, cipher

# 69343391982073836527260787066436662760820725339907775857387709078502658633087 
# 19914364722342610626569065936888842248099105322649309104924491672406432347316
```

#### 题目Flag

`n1book{ju5t_f4ctor1z3_N}`

#### WriteUp

关注Nu1L Team公众号，回复7-crypto-wp-5获取WP

---

### CommonModulus

#### 题目代码

```python
from Crypto.Util.number import *

flag = bytes_to_long("n1book{c0mm0n_m0du1u5_4ttacK}")

p = getStrongPrime(1024)
q = getStrongPrime(1024)
n = p * q
e1 = 65537
e2 = 114514191981019

c1 = pow(flag, e1, n)
c2 = pow(flag, e2, n)
print n
print c1
print c2

# 
# 
# 
```

#### 题目Flag

`n1book{c0mm0n_m0du1u5_4ttacK}`

#### WriteUp

关注Nu1L Team公众号，回复7-crypto-wp-6获取WP
